com.facebook.buck.rules.args

Class Arg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.args.Arg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleKeyAppendable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrameworkPathArg, MacroArg, RelativeLinkArg, SanitizedArg, SourcePathArg, StringArg

    public abstract class Arg
extends java.lang.Object
implements RuleKeyAppendable
    An abstraction for modeling the arguments that contribute to a command run by a BuildRule.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeps

        public abstract ImmutableCollection<BuildRule> getDeps(SourcePathResolver resolver)
        Returns:
        any BuildRules that need to be built before this argument can be used.

      • appendToCommandLine

        public abstract void appendToCommandLine(ImmutableCollection.Builder<java.lang.String> builder)
        Append the contents of the Arg to the supplied builder. This call may inject any number of elements (including zero) into the builder. This is only ever safe to call when the rule is running, as it may do things like resolving source paths.

      • toString
